title: Your pictures on the theme of 'minimalism'
content: We asked our readers to send in their best pictures on the theme "minimalism". Here are some of the pictures we received from around the world.The next theme is "a long journey", and the deadline for entries is 2 November 2021.The pictures will be published later that week and you will be able to find them, along with other galleries,on the In Pictures section of the website. <https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/in_pictures>You can upload your entries on this page <https://www.bbc.co.uk/send/u66493150> or email them to yourpics@bbc.co.uk.Terms and conditions <https://www.bbc.co.uk/terms> apply. Further details and themes are at: We set the theme, you take the pictures. <https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-10768282>All photographs subject to copyright.
